cmd='C:/Program Files/CMake/bin/cmake.exe;-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=$<CONFIG>;-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=<INSTALL_DIR>;-DMZ_ZLIB=ON;-DMZ_BZIP2=OFF;-DMZ_LZMA=OFF;-DMZ_ZSTD=OFF;-DMZ_FETCH_LIBS=OFF;-GVisual Studio 17 2022;-DCMAKE_GENERATOR_INSTANCE:INTERNAL=C:/Program Files/Microsoft Visual Studio/2022/Professional;-S;<SOURCE_DIR><SOURCE_SUBDIR>;-B;<BINARY_DIR>'
